name: ordsucuni

stmt.pretty: syl(Ord(c0), c0 ⊆ suc(⋃ c0), c0 ⊆ On)

body.origin:
|- wi(word(c0), wss(c0, csuc(cuni(c0))))
-| wi(word(c0), wss(c0, con0))
-| wi(wss(c0, con0), wss(c0, csuc(cuni(c0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (Ord(c0)→ c0 ⊆ suc(⋃ c0))
⊣ (Ord(c0)→ c0 ⊆ On)
⊣ (c0 ⊆ On → c0 ⊆ suc(⋃ c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(word(c0), wss(c0, csuc(cuni(c0))))
-| wi(word(c0), wss(c0, con0))
-| wi(wss(c0, con0), wss(c0, csuc(cuni(c0))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (Ord(c0)→ c0 ⊆ suc(⋃ c0))
⊣ (Ord(c0)→ c0 ⊆ On)
⊣ (c0 ⊆ On → c0 ⊆ suc(⋃ c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(word(c0), wss(c0, csuc(cuni(c0))))
-| wi(wss(c0, con0), wss(c0, csuc(cuni(c0))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (Ord(c0)→ c0 ⊆ suc(⋃ c0))
⊣ (c0 ⊆ On → c0 ⊆ suc(⋃ c0))

comment: An ordinal class is a subclass of the successor of its union. (Contributed by NM, 12-Sep-2003.)
